summary: LVMH, short for LVMH MoÃ«t Hennessy Louis Vuitton, is a French company that owns many famous luxury brands. It was created in 1987 when two big companies merged. LVMH now has over 70 brands, like Dior, Givenchy, and Tiffany, and it's worth more than $500 billion. It's one of the biggest companies in Europe and the world. Bernard Arnault, the richest person in the world in 2024, runs LVMH. The company sells fashion, makeup, watches, and even yachts, and it owns media outlets and a historic wine estate.
title: LVMH
